<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> provides an interface to query additional information for instructions like metadata or keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if the users specified it is safe to use. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wrapper to query additional information for instructions like metadata or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if those cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be safely used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#ad029c8abde2f42c8d5837bd5515bb18e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#ad029c8abde2f42c8d5837bd5515bb18e">IIQ</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Controls whether simplifications are allowed to constrain the range of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// possible values for uses of undef. If it is false, simplifications are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// allowed to assume a particular value for a use of undef for example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a3b12da4ca5cd8514b068a30f8716db31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a3b12da4ca5cd8514b068a30f8716db31">CanUseUndef</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a343add975d940af757f1254276d93640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a343add975d940af757f1254276d93640">SimplifyQuery</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a0ffb6d79f6befe2030328bd1d7110feb">DL</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;CXTI = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
